Check Banned Media: Verificar os tipos de mídias banidas
The time between videos the next video h: O tempo entre vídeos paraque carregue o próximo.
The maximum duration in seconds that med: The maximum duration in seconds that media can be played, regardless of amount donated. The default value is 60 seconds.
This slider helps you filter shared medi:
This slider helps you filter shared media before it can be submitted.
Off: No security
Low: 65%+ rating, 5k+ views
Medium: 75%+ rating, 40k+ views
High: 80%+ rating, 300k+ views
Very High: 85%+ rating, 900k+ views
The minimum amount a donor must donate i: The minimum amount a donor must donate in order to share media. The default value is $5.00 USD
In order to control length, you can deci: In order to control length, you can decide how much it costs per second to share media. Setting this to 0.30 would mean that for $10, media would play for 30 seconds. The default value is 0.10.
